name: Dark Spell Regeneration
text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 Spell in your opponent's GY; Set it to your field. You can banish this card from your GY and send 1 "Monster Reborn" from your hand or face-down field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "The Winged Dragon of Ra" from your GY, ignoring its Summoning conditions (but send it to the GY during the End Phase), then you can send 1 monster your opponent controls to the GY.
